mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP (SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, PHOTO, CNT) VALUES(SHOP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{photo}, #{cnt})
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, PHOTO, CNT FROM SHOP
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET POINT = POINT - ((SELECT PRICE FROM SHOP WHERE SEQ = #{shopItem.seq}) * #{itemCnt}) WHERE ID = #{loginUser.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUY (SEQ, ID, ITEM, CNT, ADDR) VALUES (BUY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{loginUser.id}, #{shopItem.seq}, #{itemCnt}, (SELECT LOCATION FROM HOSPITAL WHERE CODE = #{loginUser.code}))
